issue.title: m.facebook.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://m.facebook.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fm.facebook.com%2F) ### Comment > Ustedes me recomendaron usar la versión Nightly debido a que Facebook en el navegador no cargaba todas las publicaciones en la sección de Feeds de Facebook. Eso solucionó el problema y AdGuard funcionaba a la perfección, pero hace un par de días se actualizó la versión Nightly y dejó de bloquear los anuncios en Facebook tanto en la sección de Feeds como en la de la página inicial. NO ESTOY USANDO LA APLICACIÓN DE FACEBOOK, ESTOY VIÉNDOLO DESDE EL NAVEGADOR MÓVIL. ``` Username: @JFabianRamirezM ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/2topiu1lmt8gso0ws4c44ckcg0k40o0gxypujoyuy8.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v4.13 Nightly 1 System version: | `Android 14` Browser: | Firefox Mobile License type: | paid AdGuard mode: | VPN HTTPS filtering: | enabled Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Self-destructing first-party cookies (4320)

**Miscellaneous**:
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests DNS filtering: | server: `94.140.14.14`, `94.140.15.15`
filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/android/filters/15_optimized.txt` Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | disabled Other extensions used: | `ESET Mobile Security ` ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=and&product_version=4.13+Nightly+1&system_version=Android+14&browser=firefox+mobile&filters=2&dns_servers=94.140.14.14%2C94.140.15.15&android.mode=VPN&android.system_root=false&dns.filters=https%253A%252F%252Ffilters.adtidy.org%252Fandroid%252Ffilters%252F15_optimized.txt&dns.filters_enabled=true&dns.enabled=true&https.filtering=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.webrtc=false&stealth.push=false&stealth.location=false&stealth.strip_url=true&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.x_client=true&stealth.dpi=false&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.first_party_cookies=4320&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=false&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=true&license_type=paid)

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: electro24.pl
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://electro24.pl](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Felectro24.pl) ### Comment > When using AdGuard, the cookie consent banner is hidden but still active, blocking interaction with the website. Buttons and links become unclickable due to an invisible overlay. Temporarily disabling AdGuard solves the issue. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/r6r0vfqjq68wsc0ksogkkccks88gswor37b1xz6o5c.png?nc=1)

issue.title: www.applegadgetsbd.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.applegadgetsbd.com/offer/exclusive-deals-on-iphone-17-series](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.applegadgetsbd.com%2Foffer%2Fexclusive-deals-on-iphone-17-series) ### Comment > This website has this same annoying popup on every page visit. Please squash this. The popup image can change after a week or two based on their offerings. The website does not offer a way to stop the popup or does not recognize that I have already seen it many times. ### Screenshots
